data.actual_result: The "X New messages since" banner cover the text and makes it impossible to read. So goes for the "Connecting..." banner if you switch to that channel while connecting
data.expected_result: The "Welcome to the server" text should be fully visible
data.short_description: "X New messages since" banner covers the "Welcome to server" header text
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in a server where you have invite permissions - Ask someone to send a new message in the top channel while you're not looking at it - Switch to the channel and scroll up
